import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { addToCart, cartSelector, cartTotalPriceSelector, removeFromCart } from './main_shopSlice' const Cart = () => { const myCart = useSelector(cartSelector) const dispatch = useDispatch(); const myTotalPrice = useSelector(cartTotalPriceSelector) useEffect( ) return (

My cart

{myCart.length === 0 ? (

cart is empty

) : (

book

price

quantity

total price

{myCart.map(item => (

{item.name}

{item.author}

{/* */}
${item.price}
{item.quantity}
${item.price * item.quantity}
))}
total price${myTotalPrice}
) }
) } export default Cart
